description: Next in the developer preview release of upcoming 1.0 branch. No guarantees are made for backwards/forwards compatibility.

issues.title: Add missing InterfaceAudience annotations for classes in hbase-common and hbase-client modules

Improve spreading replication load from failed regionservers

user_permission command does not show global permissions
